verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David, when Nathan the prophet came to him,) (after he had gone in to Bathsheba.) Be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, O God, <S%H430><s%> according to Thy lovingkindness; <S%H2617><s%> According to the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of Thy compassion <S%H7356><s%> blot <S%H4229><s%> out my transgressions. <S%H6588><s%>
Wash <S%H3526><s%> me thoroughly <S%H7235><s%> from my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And cleanse <S%H2891><s%> me from my sin. <S%H9128><s%>
For I know <S%H3045><s%> my transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> And my sin <S%H9128><s%> is ever <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.

Against Thee, Thee only, <S%H905><s%> I have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> And done <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H7451><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> in Thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> So <S%H4616><s%> that Thou art justified <S%H6663><s%> when Thou dost speak, <S%H1696><s%> And blameless <S%H2135><s%> when Thou dost judge. <S%H8199><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I was brought <S%H9123><s%> forth <S%H9123><s%> in iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And in sin <S%H2399><s%> my mother <S%H517><s%> conceived <S%H3179><s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> Thou dost desire <S%H2654><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> in the innermost <S%H2910><s%> being, <S%H2910><s%> And in the hidden <S%H5640><s%> part <S%H5640><s%> Thou wilt make me know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
Purify <S%H2398><s%> me with hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and I shall be clean; <S%H2891><s%> Wash <S%H3526><s%> me, and I shall be whiter <S%H3835><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> snow. <S%H7950><s%>
Make me to hear <S%H8085><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness, <S%H8057><s%> Let the bones <S%H6106><s%> which Thou hast broken <S%H1794><s%> rejoice. <S%H1523><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face <S%H6440><s%> from my sins, <S%H2399><s%> And blot <S%H4229><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> my iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
Create <S%H1254><s%> in me a clean <S%H2889><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> And renew <S%H2318><s%> a steadfast <S%H3559><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me.
Do not cast <S%H7993><s%> me away <S%H7993><s%> from Thy presence, <S%H6440><s%> And do not take <S%H3947><s%> Thy Holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> from me.
Restore <S%H2318><s%> to me the joy <S%H8342><s%> of Thy salvation, <S%H3468><s%> And sustain <S%H5564><s%> me with a willing <S%H5082><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
[Then] I will teach <S%H3925><s%> transgressors <S%H6586><s%> Thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> And sinners <S%H2400><s%> will be converted <S%H7725><s%> to Thee.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from bloodguiltiness, <S%H1818><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> Thou God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation; <S%H8668><s%> [Then] my tongue <S%H3956><s%> will joyfully <S%H7442><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> of Thy righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
O Lord, <S%H136><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> my lips, <S%H8193><s%> That my mouth <S%H6310><s%> may declare <S%H5046><s%> Thy praise. <S%H8416><s%>
For Thou dost not delight <S%H2654><s%> in sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> otherwise I would give <S%H5414><s%> it; Thou art not pleased <S%H7521><s%> with burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering. <S%H5930><s%>

The sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are a broken <S%H7665><s%> spirit; <S%H7307><s%> A broken <S%H7665><s%> and a contrite <S%H1794><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> Thou wilt not despise. <S%H959><s%>
By Thy favor <S%H7522><s%> do <S%H3190><s%> good <S%H3190><s%> to Zion; <S%H6726><s%> Build <S%H1129><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Thou wilt delight <S%H2654><s%> in righteous <S%H6664><s%> sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> In burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H3632><s%> offering; <S%H3632><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> young <S%H6499><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> will be offered <S%H5927><s%> on Thine altar. <S%H4196><s%>
